ResponseParams.Param: Data Collection Trigger AI Input Threshold

RequestParams.Param: Data Collection Trigger AI Input Threshold

ResponseParams.Param: Data Collection Trigger AI Input Threshold

Command.Name: Read Data Collection State
Command.Description: Debug/instrumentation command to directly inspect Data AcQuisition state

Variable.Name: DAQ Skips Left
Variable.Description: Number of samples left to skip

Variable.Name: DAQ Num Presamples
Variable.Description: Actual Number of samples kept before trigger event

Variable.Name: DAQ Number Of Variables
Variable.Description: Number of variables in the configured bitmap

Variable.Name: DAQ Presamples Left
Variable.Description: Number of presamples left to copy

Variable.Name: DAQ Status
Variable.Description: Enumarated status

Variable.Name: DAQ Process Id
Variable.Description: Process on behalf of which data is collected

Variable.Name: DAQ Config Id
Variable.Description: Permanent or temporary

Variable.Name: Data Collection Conf Selector
Variable.Description: Persistent or currently in use

Variable.Name: Data Collection Context
Variable.Description: Distance between samples in multiples of "context" task

Variable.Name: Data Collection Skip Count
Variable.Description: Distance between samples in multiples of "context" task

Variable.Name: Data Collection Bitmap
Variable.Description:
Bitmap (mask) of what variables are collected
 POSITION = bit 0
 MAIN PRESSURE = bit 1
 PILOT PRESSURE = bit 2
 SUPPLY PRESSURE = bit 3
 PRESSURE B = bit 4
 SETPOINT = bit 5
 IP CURRENT = bit 6

Variable.Name: Data Collection Max Samples
Variable.Description: 0 means unlimited (other than by buffer size)

Variable.Name: Data Collection Max PreSamples
Variable.Description: (Ignored for temporary/on demand) configuration)

Variable.Name: Data Collection Command
Variable.Description: What to do with data collection process

Variable.Name: Data Collection Trigger Binary Options
Variable.Description:
Bits set indicate Allowed: 
 0:Extrn cmd (HART)
 1:TB Alerts
 4: working position deviation
 5: act. pressure deviation
 6: working sp deviation
 7: DI open
 8: DI closed
 9: Pv below
 10:Pv above
 11:PV between

Variable.Name: Data Collection Trigger AI Input Threshold
Variable.Description: Above[1]/Below[0] threshold in mA

Variable.Name: Data Collection Position Deviation Threshold
Variable.Description: Above/Below threshold in %

Variable.Name: Data Collection Setpoint Deviation Threshold
Variable.Description: Above/Below threshold in %

Variable.Name: Data Collection Pressure Deviation Threshold
Variable.Description: Above/Below threshold in pressure units

Variable.Name: Data Collection Filter Coef
Variable.Description: Exponential forgetting coef exponent for averaging the deviations
